content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

13.2 GW* of clean energy assets and counting...

ReNew Power is rapidly expanding its asset base with 7.7 GW* of commissioned capacity and 5.5 GW of committed capacity.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Community initiatives across villages

We are committed to promoting inclusive growth and empowering communities through education and the provision of employment opportunities.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-animated” bg_image_new=”id^69|url^https://newwebsite.renewpowertest.in/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/testimonial-background.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^testimonial-background|description^null”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

ReNew Power, established in 2011, is one of India’s leading renewable energy company in terms of total energy generation capacity. Since commencing operations with a 25.2 MW wind project in Jasdan, Gujarat, the company has grown exponentially, and has a current renewable asset base of over 13 GW, including projects under development and in the pipeline. In October 2019, ReNew Power became the 1st RE company in India (and 10th globally) to cross 5 GW of installed capacity. In 10 years of its operation, ReNew projects have generated many jobs, directly and indirectly. In 2019-20 ReNew Power contributed nearly 1% of the total electricity generated in India and helped mitigate 0.5% of the carbon emitted in a year.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]

OUR SOLUTIONS

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

ReNew Power is committed to leading India’s transition away from fossil fuels and meeting the rising demand for energy in a sustainable manner by delivering cleaner and smarter energy choices; thereby reducing India’s carbon footprint.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”73″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Utility Scale Wind

With 4.2 GW of commissioned and committed wind energy assets, ReNew Power has one of the largest portfolios of wind energy projects in the country.
Read More…

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”101″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Utility Scale Solar

ReNew Power is a leading solar power developer with a proven track record and a portfolio of 5.82 GW commissioned and committed utility-scale solar projects across India.
Read More…

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”102″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Utility Scale Firm Power

With a committed capacity of 1.70 GW, ReNew Power has strategically focused on developing a pan-India portfolio of utility-scale firm power projects.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”104″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

B2B Solutions

Our pan-India presence, in-house experience and world class technology make us the solar energy company of choice for small and large industrial and commercial businesses and government.
Read More..

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”3655″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Hydropower

With a capacity of 99 MW, ReNew has entered into the hydropower sector which is expected to play an important role in providing innovative renewable energy solutions for ReNew’s customers.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-vz-jquery” bg_image_new=”id^97|url^https://newwebsite.renewpowertest.in/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/bg-csr.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^bg-csr|description^null”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

ReNew Power remains committed to making meaningful, incremental improvements to the lives of rural communities in and around our project sites, paving the way for a better society and country where the fruits of development trickle down to the bottom of the pyramid and help create a safer and better planet for the generations to come. As a responsible corporate citizen, ReNew Power has been engaging in social responsibility initiatives since its inception in 2011. Our endeavour has been to forge strong relationships with communities and give back to the society through innovative high impact social development programmes, designed basis a rigorous assessment of their most pressing needs.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

  • Human Capital

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

  • Social Capital

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

  • Natural Capital

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

  • Employee Volunteering

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

OUR PRESENCE

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

Our utility scale wind and solar energy projects are spread over nine states across India. We have hundreds of businesses installation sites spread across 80 cities in 18 states in India. Our portfolio as a whole provides a diversified balance of wind and solar projects.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Events
Webinar on Moving from rhetoric to action: Ensuring a Successful COP 26
Press Release
AMAZON ANNOUNCES ITS FIRST UTILITY-SCALE RENEWABLE ENERGY PROJECTS IN INDIA
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
Awards
Distinguished Alumni Award
Project Locator
Click Here To Find All Our Projects
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
